control_attributes.control_description: The organization: (a) Standardizes dynamic address allocation lease information and the lease duration assigned to devices in accordance with [Assignment: organization-defined lease information and lease duration]; and(b) Audits lease information when assigned to a device.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system, for password-based authentication:

Control Statement: The organization: (a) Standardizes dynamic address allocation lease information and the lease duration assigned to devices in accordance with [Assignment: organization-defined lease information and lease duration]; and(b) Audits lease information when assigned to a device.
